alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 20 at 2:27AM MST until December 22 at 6:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 6 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to three inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 60 below zero. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Warning, from Noon Wednesday to 6 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Exposed skin may become quickly frostbitten or frozen.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
